name: Anthony's Pier Restaurant
description: Arcade's at end of pier and you pass through it to get to restaurant. Pins on right side, near windows.

name: Canobie Lake Park
description: Great presentation (giant silver balls, high score chalkboard, and historical photos), but sadly many of the games have mechanical problems. Staff doesn't really seem knowledgeable or on top of things here.

name: Center Mall Arcade
description: This is not a casino. And is not a part of the Casino Ballroom. It is in a arcade next to it. Machines are currently located upstairs scattered in hall across from roll-a-bingo lanes.
